name: Weather Control
description:
Mega-storms plague the land, and the major cities get destroyed one after the other. Only your new invention- weather control towers- can save the land, but they are still unstable, and often malfunction, draining already precious energy.

Game made in 48h for GMTK game jam 2020.

Game by Jekabs Vanags (programming, game design, concept) and Alise Vikele (art, concept)
